name: EpicBurn
0:
”Alexa, ask Epic Burn for epic burn”
”Alexa, ask Epic Burn to Burn Me”
”Alexa, open Epic Burn and ask for an epic burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epic burn
des: Ask 'Epic Burn' to 'Burn Me' to receive a random epic burn.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
